content: The A Thousand Days Inebriation Drink is the last drink you will likely come across in your Black Myth: Wukong through. Out of all of the Drinks, the effect of this one is the most unique actually debilitating you briefly, alongside healing you.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'A_Thousand_Days_Inebriation.md', within the main section titled 'A Thousand Days Inebriation'.
The content is as follows:
The A Thousand Days Inebriation Drink is the last drink you will likely come across in your Black Myth: Wukong through. Out of all of the Drinks, the effect of this one is the most unique actually debilitating you briefly, alongside healing you.
